snippet: Federal courts ruled last week against Attorney General Greg Abbott in two crucial voting rights cases. Even if those fights aren’t over, the losses do little to burnish his reputation.
lead_paragraph: Federal courts ruled last week against Attorney General Greg Abbott in two crucial voting rights cases. Even if those fights aren’t over, the losses do little to burnish his reputation.

headline.seo: Court Losses Do Little for Texas Prosecutor Greg Abbott’s Reputation
headline.main: Sometimes Being a Fighter Isn’t Enough
headline.print_headline: Sometimes Being A Fighter Isn’t Enough
